text: River of Blue Fire is a science fiction novel by American writer Tad Williams, the second book in his Otherland series. It was originally published in 1998, the paperback in 1999.Tad Williams, River of Blue Fire, 1998, It continues the saga begun in City of Golden Shadow and takes the characters through among others a weird Wizard of Oz simulation, a Neanderthal world and a cartoon world. ==References== Category:1998 American novels Category:1998 science fiction novels Category:American science fiction novels Category:Novels by Tad Williams Category:DAW Books books Category:Neanderthals in fiction Category:Books with cover art by Michael Whelan
